name: Burning Tire
description:
Burning Tire is open-world multiplayer off-road game.

---Control---

R+Q: shift up

R+A: shift down

P: power mode

Up Arrow: accelerate

Down Arrow: brake

Left Arrow: turn left

Right Arrow: turn right

D: reverse the car (use when your car overturned)

(hold) Tab: enable mouse cursor

-----------------

When you turn on power mode, fuel will be running out faster

so you have to refill the fuel before run out.

refill at the gas station.

-----------------
